meanings.definition: Relating to the senses or sensation.
meanings.sent1: The sensorily experience of tasting the delicious cake was delightful.
meanings.sent2: She appreciated the sensorily pleasing colors of the sunset.
meanings.sent3: The sensorily gifted chef could create magic with simple ingredients.
meanings.sent4: The sensorily rich environment of the forest filled her with peace.
meanings.sent5: The sensorily stimulating music transported him to another world.

meanings.definition: In a manner that pertains to the senses.
meanings.sent1: She explored the garden sensorily, feeling the soft petals and inhaling the fragrant scents.
meanings.sent2: The artist painted sensorily, using vibrant colors to evoke emotions.
meanings.sent3: He danced sensorily through the crowd, drawing attention with his graceful movements.
meanings.sent4: The story was told sensorily, immersing the listeners in a world of sights and sounds.
meanings.sent5: The chef cooked sensorily, relying on taste and smell to create culinary masterpieces.
